resources.string: ToTranslit allows the user to swap alphabet letters in input text quickly and conveniently. Main screen contains language picker at the top, input text below box and output text box at the bottom. Next to input text box there is Paste button. This button allows the user to insert text from clipboard. Buttons at the bottom of the main screen: share result, copy result to clipboard, settings, clear, info. Application comes with predefined languages: Russian >>> Translt and Translit >>> Russian. ToTranslit allows user to create, edit and to delete language tables. In order to create new table go to settings, then tap New button. Type in the boxes provided a source language and a result language for example Greek in left box, and English into right box. Mirror check-box will create two tables with opposite names for example: Greek >>> English and English >>> Greek. Add button allows the user to add new symbol into current table. Case check-box allows to add upper and lower case symbols at the same time. Delete button allows to delete current table Copy button allows to make a copy of a table using different name. Merge button allows to merge two tables into one.
